sentence.text: PRUNE is a member of the proteolysis (Asp-His-His) phosphoesterase protein superfamily of molecules important for cell motility, and implicated in cancer progression.

Here we investigated multiple families from Oman, India, Iran and Italy with individuals affected by a new autosomal recessive neurodevelopmental and degenerative disorder in which the negative regulation of lipopolysaccharide-mediated signaling pathway features include primary microcephaly and profound global developmental delay.

entity.text: negative regulation of lipopolysaccharide-mediated signaling pathway
